subject: Use of OldTestClassRunner in ClassRequest

messageBody:
org.junit.internal.requests.ClassRequest contains logic which selects
the appropriate Runner for use with a given test class. This logic
includes picking the OldTestClassRunner for junit3 tests.

This is great, since I have a large number of legacy junit3 tests
mixed in with some junit4 tests, and I can just pass them all to
JunitCore and they work.

However, in a few cases, I have junit 3 tests with a static suite()
method. Junit4 can handle this using the AllTests runner, but
unfortunately the code in ClassRequest ddoes not make use of AllTests
which decided which runner to use.

Could ClassRequest be altered to detect if AllTests should be used,
rather just handing the test straight to OldTestClassRunner?
